original_text: When you have eaten and are satisfied, praise the Lord your God for the good land he has given you.
korean_text: 네가 먹어서 배부르고 네 하나님 여호와께서 옥토를 네게 주셨음으로 말미암아 그를 찬송하리라

sentences.original_text: When you have eaten and are satisfied
for the good land he has given you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네게 주신 아름다운 땅을 인하여
